member.name: M:moosik.api.Controllers.PostController.GetAllPost(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a list of all post object. Filters posts matching threadId if provided.
member.response: Success - List has been successfully returned
Bad Request - Check input values
Not Found - No such list exists

member.name: M:moosik.api.Controllers.PostController.GetPostById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the post matching a given PostId
member.returns: Post object matching the given id parameter
member.response: Success - Post has been successfully returned
Bad Request - Check input values
Not Found - Given Post does not exist

member.name: M:moosik.api.Controllers.PostController.GetPostsAfterDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns all Post objects that occur after the provided date
member.returns: List of Post objects containing all Posts that occur after a provided date

member.name: M:moosik.api.Controllers.PostController.UpdatePost(moosik.api.ViewModels.PostViewModel)
member.summary: Updates the Post object matching the provided PostId of the request body object, returns the newly updated object
member.remarks:
Sample request:
Body: { id: 1, description: "Cool Song", userId: 4, threadId: 7, createdDate: "2008-10-31T17:04:32" }
member.returns: Post object if it has been updated, otherwise error code
member.response: Success - Post has been successfully updated
Bad Request - Check input values
Not Found - No such Post exists to update

member.name: M:moosik.api.Controllers.PostController.CreatePost(moosik.api.ViewModels.CreatePostViewModel)
member.summary: Creates a new Post using the provided Post object
member.remarks:
Sample request:
Body: { "ThreadId": 1, "UserId": 7, "Description": "REPLY FROM POSTMAN", "PostResourceTitle": "MY PR TITLE", "PostResourceValue": "MY PR VALUE", "ResourceTypeId": 1 }
member.returns: Newly created Post provided it has been created, otherwise an error code
member.response: Success - Post has been successfully created
Bad Request - Check input values

member.name: M:moosik.api.Controllers.PostController.DeletePost(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the Post matching the provided PostId

members.member:
Updates the Thread object matching the provided ThreadId of the request body object, returns the newly updated object
-
Sample request:
Body: { id: 8, title: "Need a good song please", threadTypeId: 4, userId: 7, createdDate: "2008-10-31T17:04:32" }
Thread object if it has been updated, otherwise error code Success - Thread has been successfully updated Bad Request - Check input values Not Found - No such Thread exists to update

member.name: M:moosik.api.Controllers.ThreadController.CreateThread(moosik.api.ViewModels.CreateThreadViewModel)
member.summary: Creates a new Thread using the provided CreateThreadViewModel
member.remarks:
Sample request:
Body: { Title: "Need song for gym please", PostDescription: "Going to gym, please help with song" ThreadTypeId: 2, UserId: 1, PostResourceTitle: "Beatles - Ticket to Ride" PostResourceValue: "htp://youtube.com/tickettoride" ResourceTypeId: 1 }
member.returns: Newly created Thread provided it has been created, otherwise an error code
member.response: Success - Post has been successfully created
Bad Request - Check input values

member.summary: Deletes the Thread matching the provided ThreadId
